query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS isolation_forest_models (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  target_type ENUM('device', 'device_group', 'production_line', 'global') NOT NULL,
  target_id INT,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  num_trees INT DEFAULT 100,
  sample_size INT DEFAULT 256,
  contamination DECIMAL(5,4) DEFAULT 0.0100,
  max_depth INT,
  model_data JSON,
  feature_stats JSON,
  status ENUM('training', 'active', 'inactive', 'failed') DEFAULT 'inactive',
  accuracy DECIMAL(5,4),
  `precision` DECIMAL(5,4),
  recall DECIMAL(5,4),
  f1_score DECIMAL(5,4),
  trained_at BIGINT,
  training_samples INT,
  version INT DEFAULT 1,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_model_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_model_status (status)
)
command:

  trained_at BIGINT,

  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_model_target (target_type, target_id),
  INDEX idx_model_status (status)
